name: Application
summary: A graphical user interface which allows the user to interact with the application.
author: Samsung Electronics

name: WatchFace
summary: A watch face with the current time as its user interface.
author: Samsung Electronics

name: Widget
summary: A quick view of specific information on homescreen.
author: Samsung Electronics

name: Service
summary: An application running in the background without any user interface.
author: Samsung Electronics
